item.title: Split Brain, by Heisenberg (Even Faster!, Totems Only) [Competition] | Creeper World 4 Colonies #344
item.description: Description of this map: This oddly shaped structure seems to have two viable options for survival. Hard to tell which is the better option, you may just attempt to get a foothold on both early on, or this may just prove to be fatal. The creeper will be coming at you from all sides, so carefully review your options I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!
